items.title: How four-year hunt for NZ dad on the run with his children unfolded
items.description: After a handful of chance encounters and brief sightings, the fugitive was shot dead on Monday morning.

items.title: At least 19 dead in Nepal after Gen Z protests at corruption and social media ban
items.description: Young protesters are demanding the government lift its social media ban and tackle corruption.

items.title: Six killed by Palestinian gunmen at Jerusalem bus stop
items.description: Israeli police say two gunmen were killed after the attack, which was one of the deadliest in the city in years.

items.title: Lisbon funicular crash victim was 'transport enthusiast'
items.description: Sixteen people died when the funicular crashed into a building in the Portuguese capital.

items.title: 'Tariffs are costing my business $100,000 a month'
items.description: The gulf between Trump's rhetoric and the reality on the ground is starting to show.
